If Statements

If statements allow your program to make decisions.

Example:

age = 18

if age >= 18:
    print("You are an adult")
else:
    print("You are a minor")

Comparison Operators:

  • == (equal to)
  • ! = (not equal to)
  • > (greater than)
  • < (less than)
  • >= (greater than or equal to)
  • <= (less than or equal to)
